Title: Object: The pyramids of Egypt
Description: View of the pyramids beside the nile with city on the opposite bank, three figures gathered beside a sphinx in the foreground, a procession of figures with camel beyond; illustration to Martyn's 'Geography'. 1782 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: From a series of illustrations at 1875,0710.2853-2876, Sse 1875,0710.2853 for comment.
